messages.messageBody:
Michael et al-
If your paper attributes the blade to this; 寅勝
Nobukatsu then your man is from Higo and a student of Hosokawa
Masayoshi, now I'd be happy to tell you more but feel you'll want to
research this for yourself. let me know if you want us to spill the
rest of the beans...
-t

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
